main_definition: To provide a brief summary or overview of the main points, structure, or essential aspects of something.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A preliminary version of a written work that outlines the key ideas and sections
meanings_and_examples.example: After researching her topic, Sarah created an outline to help organize her thoughts before starting her essay.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act of drawing or describing the basic shape and features of something without including finer details
meanings_and_examples.example: Using a pencil, she began to outline the main shapes of the building on paper before adding more intricate elements.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A set boundary line that shows where one object ends and another begins
meanings_and_examples.example: The artist used an outline around his drawing to distinguish it from the white background.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To discuss or talk about something in general terms without going into specifics
meanings_and_examples.example: At the meeting, they only gave a brief outline of their plans for the upcoming project.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A list or plan that shows the main points to be covered before more detailed work is done
meanings_and_examples.example: The teacher asked each student to prepare an outline of their presentation, including key arguments and evidence.
